description: Sydney is big and fierce. Out classed by the Pirate the Widow is worn down and beaten badly. However The Black Widow never quits and appeared to get stronger as the match went on. With skills, the Black Widow will be a formable opponent. Until then however, she gets fuck hard and good by the undefeated Pirate.
title: The Pirate (2-0) vs. The Black Widow (0-0)
